headline: Jefferies raises these hotel stocks to Buy, highlights business model strength
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies upgraded Marriott International (NASDAQ:MAR) and Hilton Worldwide Holdings (NYSE:HLT) to Buy from Hold in a note Monday, citing the strength and resilience of their asset-light business models in the face of economic uncertainty.

headline: 3 Hated Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.
